name: Jump Bot
description:
This was a game created in approximately 40 hours for the Mix and Game Jam. The theme of the game jam was dimension change, attempt to clone a mechanic from either 2D/3D into 3D/2D respectively. I've attempted to recreate the jumping mechanic found in Jump King. You'll probably get tilted playing this game.

The 3D model, rigging, animating, programming was all done from scratch using Blender 2.8 and Unity 2019.2.9

The music was also composed by me on Cakewalk using the Sonatina Symphonic Orchestra patches and Spitfire LABS.

Note: I was planning on making this game browser-friendly but I encountered an issue where the Cinemachine free-look camera lacked the "free-look" and had limited X-axis rotation in the browser. Unfortunately, due to time constraints, I've uploaded the game as is, and is submitted as a downloadable for the Mix and Game Jam.
